molecular.statistics.time_series¶

Description

Functions related to time series analysis.

Functions

acorr(a[, fft])

Compute the lag-\(k\) autocorrelation \(\rho(k)\) from dataset \(a\).

acov(a[, fft])

Compute the unbiased auto-covariance function \(\gamma(k)\) from dataset \(a\) with \(N\) samples for lag-time \(k\).

inefficiency(a)

Compute the statistical inefficiency \(g\) from the equilibration time :math:` au_{corr}`.

sem_tcorr(a[, tol])

Estimate of standard error of the mean derived from the correlation time.

tcorr(a[, fft])

Compute correlation time \(\tau_{corr}\) based on the autocorrelation function \(\rho(k)\).

Previous topic

molecular.statistics.block_error

Next topic
